objects.specification: A tall, solid wall panel in a modern minimalist style, featuring a smooth matte-white surface with subtle beveled edges at top and bottom. The panel is visually prominent yet simple, creating a clean backdrop for branding and lighting elements.

A tall, solid wall panel in a modern minimalist style, featuring a smooth matte-white surface with subtle beveled edges at top and bottom. The panel is visually prominent yet simple, creating a clean backdrop for branding and lighting elements.

A large rectangular floor plane with a smooth light-gray finish, slightly reflective to give a polished showroom look. The surface is even and unobtrusive, providing a neutral base for all booth elements.

A full-size, realistic modern sedan with smooth aerodynamic contours, metallic blue paint finish, tinted panoramic windows, chrome-accented grille, alloy wheels with low-profile tires, and subtle LED light strips. The model is detailed to showcase interior seats and dashboard features.

A sleek, low-profile reception counter with a brushed-metallic gold finish on the front panel and a dark matte-black countertop. The form is minimalist with clean right angles, providing a welcoming station for brochure display and visitor interaction.
A small round table with a dark-gray matte surface and slender metal legs in a matching finish, designed to compliment the booth edges and provide a casual seating area.
A compact visitor chair with a padded dark-gray seat and backrest, supported by slender metal legs matching the table style.
A compact visitor chair with a padded dark-gray seat and backrest, supported by slender metal legs matching the table style.

A slim cylindrical spotlight with a warm-white LED beam, mounted overhead. The fixture has a minimal matte-black housing and directs a focused cone of light onto the car display.

A highly detailed miniature car model in metallic finish, featuring realistic wheels, painted body panels, and tinted windows. Placed as a decorative accessory on the reception counter.
A small side stand with a dark-gray matte top and slim metal legs, designed to hold promotional items or miniature models.
